title: 10 Things we Learned from 10 Days in Quarantine
description:
This week on the Colin and Samir Podcast we’re talking about some lessons that we’ve learned in 10 days of being in quarantined here in Los Angeles. We’ve kept ourselves busy with making videos, podcasts and instagram posts but we have also had a significant change in our daily lives.
So in this episode we breakdown some lessons we’ve learned and how those lessons can be applied once this whole experience is over. 
Make sure to subscribe and send us a voice message on Anchor!
itunes:author: Colin and Samir
